title: Gunshot Effects
longDescription:
Enjoy the dynamic and action animation template, which includes a unique collection of energy elements! This package contains 12 Gunshot sprite sheet animations for 2D Games.

         

Features:

● Sprite animations work much better than any other shaders and particles due to

memory capacity.

● Optimized for games.

● Pivot point set properly.

● No setup or plug-ins required.

● All materials, sprites and other parts of pack properly named.
technicalDetails:
Video:

https://youtu.be/0CfrqxKxnTw


Technical details:

● File Formats: transparent Png.

● Each frame dimension is 512*288 px.

● 30 FPS


Texture Resolutions:


● Gunshot 01_#[512,288].png 2048x1296

● Gunshot 02_#[512,288].png 1536x1152

● Gunshot 03_#[512,288].png 2048x1296

● Gunshot 04_#[512,288].png 2048x1440

● Gunshot 05_#[512,288].png 2048x1440

● Gunshot 06_#[512,288].png 2048x1440

● Gunshot 07_#[512,288].png 2048x1408

● Gunshot 08_#[512,288].png 2048x1267

● Gunshot 09_#[512,288].png 2048x1267

● Gunshot 10_#[512,288].png 2048x1280

● Gunshot 11_#[512,288].png 2048x1152

● Gunshot 12_#[512,288].png 2048x1296


Number of Textures: 12

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
